title: | Video | Attorney general advises composite floor test: Will it end AIADMK power tussle? | Top Takes Videos | - India Today
text:
Feedback 
Even after the Attorney General Mukul Rohatgi advised Tamil Nadu Governor Vidyasagar Rao to hold floor test in the coming week, the matter still remains ambiguous. With top political pundits and lawmakers also abiding by the show of strenght in Assembly, it seems this is the only way out for both Sasikala and OPS. Next Video
